name: StickyKnife
description:
IF THE HTML5 DOES NOT WORK, PLEASE TRY THE WINDOWS DOWNLOAD! THANKS :D

Use the sticky knife to bring together objects with the knife.

When the knife hits an enemy, the enemy will be attached to the knife, and you can shoot that enemy to score higher!

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Left Click: Throw Knife 

Right Click: Launch objects attached to the knife

Spacebar: Return Knife

Developer: ConsoleX

Artwork for Tree + Plants: Gutty Kreum --->  https://twitter.com/GuttyKreum

Music: ConsoleX
